definition: Blu-ray disk, Sony high definition DVD disk

sentences.english: Our son came back from the barber's shop as bald as coot.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿子从理发店回来，头发剃得光光的。

sentences.english: I can't believe how fast I scarfed down those cookies!
sentences.chinese: 我不敢相信这么快就把饼干吃光光。

sentences.english: The dog picked the bone clean.
sentences.chinese: 这狗把骨头啃得光光的。

sentences.english: He decided that he must make some accomplishment and then marry her grandly.
sentences.chinese: 他一定要干出名堂来，然后风风光光迎娶她。

sentences.english: So why did this nakedness evolve?
sentences.chinese: 这光光地身子是怎么进化出来的呢？
他把头发弄得油光光的。

sentences.english: The bare head of the kid is out from her mother's chest.
sentences.chinese: 光光的脑袋从她妈妈胸前的裹布里伸在外面。

sentences.english: The boy wore a shirt with the neck open, showing his bare chest.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩儿穿着一件衬衫，颈部敞开，露出光光的胸膛。

sentences.english: He rubbed the vase up until it shone.
sentences.chinese: 他将花瓶擦得亮光光的。

sentences.english: A bowl of soup a day could keep the pounds at bay.
sentences.chinese: 一天一碗汤，脂肪减光光。

sentences.english: Batwing light shape distribution, rectangular spot conforms to street light standards.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠翼配光光形，矩形光斑符合道路的标准。

sentences.english: "Clean Gone" was just on the poor mouse's tongue, and the cat ate her.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的老鼠刚要说出“全光光”，猫就把她给吃了。

sentences.english: Moon bright fills in the basket full.
Bare-root plants have no soil on their roots.
sentences.chinese: 光光的植物根茎上没有泥土。

sentences.english: The floor under them was black with grease and cigarette ends.
sentences.chinese: 脚下的地板乌光光的油腻滑溜，烟蒂满地。

sentences.english: Now you're as naked as a newly-born baby.
sentences.chinese: 看你脱得光光的，像刚出生的婴儿。

definition: (pet name for a baby or small child)
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
to strip naked/to strip nude/(coll.) to find oneself a partner
not wearing one thread (idiom); absolutely naked/without a stitch of clothing/in one's birthday suit
